description: Triggers workflows in n8n based on events from Microsoft Teams, such as new messages or team updates, using specified configurations.

essential_properties.name: teamId
essential_properties.description: Select a team from the list, enter an ID or a URL

essential_properties.name: channelId
essential_properties.description: Select a channel from the list, enter an ID or a URL

essential_properties.name: chatId
essential_properties.description: Select a chat from the list, enter an ID or a URL
